alert.note: Alert for Henry Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 16 at 3:51AM MDT until June 17 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 10 PM MDT FRIDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 494 BELOW 7500 FEET... The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a Red Flag Warning below 7500 feet for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from noon to 10 PM MDT Friday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 494 Henry Mountains. * WINDS...South 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 11 percent. * IMPACTS...Critical fire weather conditions will occur. Any new fire starts or existing fires may spread rapidly.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or are imminent. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
